# Title

Navigated Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Motor Mapping Usefulness in the Surgical Management of Patients Affected by Brain Tumors in Eloquent Areas: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.

# Keywords

NTMs 
craniotomy 
glioma 
motor mapping 
surgical planning 
tractography
